title: 41 - Live from EW Popfest
description: This week was recorded live from the Entertainment Weekly Popfest 2016. Karen and Georgia share Hollywood tales of murder including Lana Turner's dark family secrets and the Wasp Woman, Susan Cabot. Plus a hometown murder picked right from the studio audience!
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
